nodes.name: Normals for Tribunal Traditions from Articus
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive ~ add-on for the mod Tribunal Traditions from Articus that adds normal and spec textures to improve the looks

nodes.name: Normals for Articus Telvanni 2K Retexture v2
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive ~ add-on for the Articus Telvanni 2K Retexture v2 mod that adds normal and spec textures to improve the looks

nodes.name: Quake Yellow Imperial Castles
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - give the Imperial Castles a look inspired by the Quake yellow castles, mainly seen in the The Corridors of Time episode

nodes.name: Quake Stucco in Dunmer Home Ruins
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - give the old Dunmer Home ruins a look inspired by the Quake stucco

nodes.name: Fleshy Daedric
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive ~ give the Daedric structures an eldritch flesh-like look

nodes.name: All hairs and heads are playable
nodes.summary: Tiny mod that makes all heads and hairs playable

nodes.name: Normals for Articus Redoran 2K Retexture
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive ~ add-on for Articus Redoran 2K Retexture mod that adds normal and spec textures to improve the looks

nodes.name: Quake Dungeons Style Daedric Ruins
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - give the Daedric Ruins a look inspired by the Quake dungeons, a weird mix of decaying stone and rusting metal. It is not brown, it is beautiful.

nodes.name: Normals for Articus Hlaalu 2K Retexture
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive ~ add-on for Articus Hlaalu 2K Retexture mod that adds normal, spec, and glowmap textures to improve the looks

nodes.name: Ashlanders re-texture with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - re-texture the ashlanders models giving a stronger red color with normals

nodes.name: Quake Terracotta Style Hlaalu Buildings
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - give the Hlaalu buildings a look inspired by the Medieval Terracotta Quake levels, orange-dominated brick palaces

nodes.name: Normals for Articus Telvanni 2K Retexture
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive ~ add-on for Articus Telvanni 2K Retexture mod that adds normal, spec, and glowmap textures to improve the looks

nodes.name: Quake Wizard Blue Ebon Style Dunmer Strongholds
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - give the Dunmer strongholds a look inspired by the Blue Ebon Quake Wizard levels, a magical mix of metal, runes, and blue stones.

nodes.name: Sheogorath's Daedric
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive — gives the daedric ruins a makeover worth of Sheogorath — very intense

nodes.name: Rainbow obsidian imperial castles
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive - makes the imperial castle from rainbow obsidian and puts isolating wood in the interiors

nodes.name: Imperial Homes re-texture with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive - give the imperial homes a new colorful look with normals

nodes.name: Imperial Castles re-texture with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - gives imperial castles a distinctive look

nodes.name: Telvanni re-texture with normals
nodes.summary: Gives the Telvanni a natural, woodsy feel with a hint of magic

nodes.name: Cabin and Docks re-texture with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive - gives cabins and docks a new colorful look with normals

nodes.name: Crab-Mansions Redoran with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW Exclusive - Gives Redoran huts and Under-Skar rooms a makeover with normal and spec textures

nodes.name: Little-secret-inspired Daedric Textures with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive — Gives the Daedric structures a look inspired by the little-secret text

nodes.name: Secunda Termina
nodes.summary: Replaces Secunda with Termina

nodes.name: Egyptian-inspired Velothi Textures with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive — Gives the Velothi an Egyptian-inspired look

nodes.name: Golden Dwemer
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive - a golden retexture of the Dwemer architecture with normals, speculars, and few glowmaps

nodes.name: Aztec-inspired Hlaalu Textures with normals
nodes.summary: OpenMW exclusive - Gives the Hlaalu an Aztec-inspired look

nodes.name: Creature Pack by Mephisto
nodes.summary: [Historical mod uploaded for preservation]Creature Pack 1.1 is a mod that will add many new variations of existing creatures to various Leveled-creature lists. It will increase the

nodes.name: Highly visible keys and propylon indices
nodes.summary: Make keys and propylon indices highly visible

nodes.name: Suran Dancer Randomized
nodes.summary: Each new day you get three randomly chosen dancers in the Desele's House of Earthly Delights in Suran

nodes.name: Guards' Hounds
nodes.summary: Give to some Guards a pet

nodes.name: Tree House from dongle
nodes.summary: A model for a massive three-story tree-trunk hollowed out into a home. Doorways, balconies, windows, walks, and stairways wrap all around the trunk

nodes.name: Farvyn Oreyn's Position Randomizer
nodes.summary: Place Farvyn Oreyn, the fake hero, in a random location around Gar Mok

nodes.name: Din's Position Randomizer
nodes.summary: Place Din, the sick legionary, in a random location around Gnisis

nodes.name: Mannequins for Sale
nodes.summary: Add mannequins so that when you "talk" to one of them, you can dress it using Companion Share or use one of the special topics to pick it up or change its pose

nodes.name: ManaUser Minimod
nodes.summary: A set of mods mostly,  but not all could be considered "tweaks," but the only thing they really have in common is that they're fairly small, esp-only mods

nodes.name: Arcana of Magic - lootable spells
nodes.summary: Spells need to be learnt from special scrolls known as "arcanum"

nodes.name: Yet Another Quickstart
nodes.summary: Skip tutorial

nodes.name: Cliff Racer Nests and Eggs by DonnerGott
nodes.summary: Adds 100 Racer Pods and 36 Racer Creches with egg-containers and bricka-brack to Vvardenfell

nodes.name: Paper
nodes.summary: esp-less replacer for books, scrolls, and parchments

nodes.name: Housepod Pack by Kzinistzerg
nodes.summary: Add up to five housepods around the map

nodes.name: Abandoned treehouse by Stormwyynd
nodes.summary: Add a small treehouse located on the same island as Sarys Ancestral tomb

nodes.name: Roadmarkers by ddfields
nodes.summary: (Historical Mod) Change all the roadmarkers to read exactly what it displays when you get close enough for the name to display, in daedric.

nodes.name: A Mix of Textures by Tealpanda
nodes.summary: (Hisorical Mod) This is a texture replacer for Velothi (including Vivec), Hlaalu, Redoran, Telvanni, and Dunmer Stronghold architecture.  It also replaces the texture of some

nodes.name: Colorful Toadstools
nodes.summary: Change the tops of the giant toadstools and mushrooms house pods to be more colorful and variegated. Some tops also faintly glows in the dark.

nodes.name: Puma Man Wilderness
nodes.summary: Puma Man classic mod that adds all kind of animals and mythical creatures in the whole island

nodes.name: Puma Man Giants
nodes.summary: Classic Puma Man mod that add an hundred of creatures to fight

nodes.name: Different Sky Colors
nodes.summary: Instead of blue, skies will be more orange/purple/green/teal depending on the weather.

nodes.name: Illuminiel Museum
nodes.summary: Illuminiel is a great modder from the past, this page collects his works for Morrowind

nodes.name: Little-secret-inspired Daedric Ruins
nodes.summary: Makes the Daedric ruins gray-green

nodes.name: Cait's Critter's Unleashed
nodes.summary: Adds real-world farm animals all around the map

nodes.name: Swiveller's Ashland and Molag Amur
nodes.summary: Retexture for the Ashland and Molag Amur; so that are more distinct

nodes.name: Ghostgate Protection
nodes.summary: This mods adds few Ordinators and Buoyant Armigers around Ghostgate to make feel it is protected and monsters cannot pass just pressing a button

nodes.name: Manual Compass
nodes.summary: (OpenMW exclusive) The compass now needs to be used manually, you do not have the arrow automatically telling where you are facing anymore

nodes.name: Meet thy Ancestor for Level Up
nodes.summary: (OpenMW Exclusive) To level up you can meet your ancestor, custodian of knowledge, and learn from them

nodes.name: Guild Guides for Almsivi Temple and Imperial Legion factions
nodes.summary: The mod adds Mysticism experts for the Almsivi Temple and Imperial Legion factions to teleport the player around the island, just like the Mage Guild's counterparts

nodes.name: Barrowmoth Legion Fort
nodes.summary: It adds an atmospheric imperial castle, long overrun by Dagoth Ur forces, in the steep slopes of the Red Mountain.

nodes.name: Another Rules Rebalance
nodes.summary: Another mod that wants to make the rules of Morrowind more reasonable

nodes.name: Tsaesci Flying Snake
nodes.summary: Adds the Tsaesci Flying Snake daedroth to the skies of Morrowind

nodes.name: Another Armor n Weapon Rebalance
nodes.summary: Rebalances armors and weapons to reduce the quality jump between armors and increase variety

nodes.name: Tome of Spell Making n Hammer of Enchanting
nodes.summary: It puts a Tome of Spellmaking and a Hammer of Enchanting in each Mage's Guild. It works like an NPC spellmaker or enchanter except it costs magicka instead of gold.

nodes.name: Undead Nightmare
nodes.summary: The Dwemer experiment failed and now the island is overrun by undead.Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Extra Spawn Points
nodes.summary: For each spawn point, this mod adds one, two, four, or eight more of the same kind

nodes.name: LeFemm Armor with complete Gold Armor
nodes.summary: LeFemm Armor, specially tailored for the ladies, is on sale at the Fighters Guild in Vivec, from Sirollus Saccus in Ebonheart, the Redoran Vaults, and the lady smiths in Ald-ruhn,

nodes.name: To save a falling wizard (alternate)
nodes.summary: The mod expands upon Tarhiel, the bosmer enchanter that fall to his death nearby Seyda Neen. With this mod, if you manage to rescue him he'll thank you and give a quest to learn

nodes.name: More common Restore Magicka Potions
nodes.summary: Makes the Restore Magicka Potions more common

nodes.name: Morrowind Forested
nodes.summary: Transform the bleak landscapes of Vvardenfell in into lush, green forested areas.

nodes.name: Colorful Morrowind
nodes.summary: Selection of extra textures to make Morrowind more magical looking and colorful

nodes.name: Classic Morrowind Forested
nodes.summary: Transform the bleak landscapes of Vvardenfell in green, lush, forested areas (Classic).
